meanings.sent1: His shortsightedness prevented him from considering the long-term consequences.
meanings.sent2: Her shortsightedness made her miss out on great opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The shortsightedness of only focusing on immediate gains led to their downfall.
meanings.sent4: Their shortsightedness in planning resulted in a chaotic event.
meanings.sent5: The consequences of his shortsightedness were evident to everyone.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to see things clearly in the distance.
meanings.sent1: His shortsightedness made it difficult for him to read road signs from far away.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed glasses to correct her shortsightedness.
meanings.sent3: The shortsightedness of the binoculars made everything look blurry.
meanings.sent4: Her shortsightedness in geography made her get lost often.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the landscape was lost on him due to his shortsightedness.
